Title: NZ CanShare data absent reason
Description: Reasons that no specific value is available.

Title: NZ CanShare SACT observation code
Description: Observable entities used to represent the meaning of CanShare data elements.

Title: NZ CanShare SACT basis of diagnosis
Description: The types of evidence used to reach a cancer diagnosis.

Title: NZ CanShare hematolymphoid histology
Description: Histologies used for haematolymphoid cancer types (WHO Classification of Tumours, Haematolymphoid Tumours, 5th edition)

Title: NZ CanShare hematolymphoid myeloid histology
Description: Histologies used for myeloid proliferations and neoplasms (WHO Classification of Tumours, Haematolymphoid Tumours, 5th edition - 2. Myeloid proliferations and neoplasms)

Title: NZ CanShare hematolymphoid histiocytic histology
Description: Histologies used for histiocytic and dentritic cell neoplasms (WHO Classification of Tumours, Haematolymphoid Tumours, 5th edition - 3. Histiocytic/Dendritic cell neoplasms)

Title: NZ CanShare hematolymphoid B-cell histology
Description: Histologies used for B-cell lymphoid proliferations and lymphomas (WHO Classification of Tumours, Haematolymphoid Tumours, 5th edition - 4. B-cell lymphoid proliferations and lymphomas)

Title: NZ CanShare hematolymphoid T/NK-cell histology
Description: Histologies used for T-cell and NK-cell lymphoid proliferations and lymphomas (WHO Classification of Tumours, Haematolymphoid Tumours, 5th edition - 5. T-cell and NK-cell lymphoid proliferations and lymphomas)

Title: NZ CanShare hematolymphoid stroma-derived histology
Description: Histologies used for stroma-derived neoplasms of lymphoid tissues (WHO Classification of Tumours, Haematolymphoid Tumours, 5th edition - 6. Stroma-derived neoplasms of lymphoid tissues)

Title: NZ CanShare laterality
Description: The side of a paired organ, e.g. left or right.

Title: NZ CanShare AJCC grade
Description: The grade of a cancer, assessed using the AJCC cancer staging manual (8th edition)

Title: NZ CanShare cancer grading system
Description: Grading systems used to assess the grade of one or more cancer types.

Title: NZ CanShare cancer recurrence type
Description: The type of cancer recurrence, e.g. local, regional.

Title: NZ CanShare ECOG status
Description: The performance status of a patient as defined by the Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group (ECOG).

Title: NZ CanShare TNM clinical T category
Description: The clinical stage of a primary tumour before initiation of treatment, using the AJCC cancer staging manual (8th edition).

Title: NZ CanShare TNM breast clinical T category
Description: The clinical stage of a primary breast tumour before initiation of treatment, using the AJCC cancer staging manual (8th edition).

Title: NZ CanShare TNM haematology clinical T category
Description: The clinical stage of a primary haematologic cancer before initiation of treatment, using the AJCC cancer staging manual (8th edition).

Title: NZ CanShare TNM haematology mycosis fungoides or sezary syndrome clinical T category
Description: The clinical stage of a mycosis fungoides or sezary syndrome primary cutaneous lymphoma before initiation of treatment, using the AJCC cancer staging manual (8th edition).

Title: NZ CanShare TNM haematology primary cutaneous  B-cell or T-cell lymphoma (non-MF/SS) clinical T category
Description: The clinical stage of a primary cutaneous B-cell or T-cell lymphoma (non-mycosis fungoides and non-sezary syndrome) before initiation of treatment, using the AJCC cancer staging manual (8th edition).

Title: NZ CanShare TNM pathological T category
Description: The pathological stage of a primary tumour, using the AJCC cancer staging manual (8th edition).

Title: NZ CanShare TNM carcinoma of breast pathological T category
Description: The pathological stage of a primary breast tumour, using the AJCC cancer staging manual (8th edition).

Title: NZ CanShare TNM haematology pathological T category
Description: The pathological stage of a primary haematologic cancer, using the AJCC cancer staging manual (8th edition).

Title: NZ CanShare TNM haematology mycosis fungoides or sezary syndrome pathological T category
Description: The pathological stage of a mycosis fungoides or sezary syndrome primary cutaneous lymphoma, using the AJCC cancer staging manual (8th edition).

Title: NZ CanShare TNM primary cutaneous B-cell or T-cell lymphoma (non-MF/SS) pathological T category
Description: The pathological stage of a primary cutaneous B-cell or T-cell lymphoma (non-mycosis fungoides and non-sezary syndrome), using the AJCC cancer staging manual (8th edition).
